alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nueces, central Jim Wells and northwestern Kleberg Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Driscoll. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alice, Bishop, Alice Acres, Agua Dulce and Lake Alice. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 676 and 678. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells
